description: A senior Jersey civil servant says the island is "extremely well-connected".
title: No-deal Brexit Jersey supplies disruption 'minimal'
title_page: No-deal Brexit Jersey supplies disruption 'minimal' - BBC News
maintext: However, both the Channel Islands' largest governments, Jersey's and the Bailiwick of Guernsey, have been working with the UK for more than a year to prevent supply chain disruption.
